Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nebulas.core.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    The Transaction Class.

      static java.math.BigInteger GasCountPerByte
      .
      static int MaxDataBinPayloadLength
      Max data length in binary transaction, which is 64 Byte.
      static int MaxDataPayLoadLength
      Max data length in transaction, which is 128 KBytes.
      static java.math.BigInteger MinGasCountPerTransaction
      The minimum GasLimit for a transaction, which is 20000.
      static java.math.BigInteger TransactionGasPrice
      Default GasPrice, which is 1000000 .
      static java.math.BigInteger TransactionMaxGas
      The maximum allowed GasLimit for a transaction, which is 50*10^9.
      static java.math.BigInteger TransactionMaxGasPrice
      The maximum allowed GasPrice for a transaction, which is 1*10^12 wei.

      • TransactionMaxGasPrice

        public static final java.math.BigInteger TransactionMaxGasPrice

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int chainID,
                   Address from,
                   Address to,
                   java.math.BigInteger value,
                   long nonce,
                   Transaction.PayloadType payloadType,
                   byte[] payload,
                   java.math.BigInteger gasPrice,
                   java.math.BigInteger gasLimit)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs a new Transaction.
        Parameters:
        chainID - the chain id
        from - the account address of sender
        to - the account address of receiver
        value - the value to be transferred with this transaction, in unit of wei
        nonce - the nonce
        payloadType - the payload type
        payload - the payload content
        gasPrice - the gas price
        gasLimit - the gas limit
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
